name: Death Prophet
title: Krobelus
lore: Krobelus was a Death Prophet, a seer who could speak with the spirits of the dead. She learned her own death was near.

cryptSwarm.name: Crypt Swarm
cryptSwarm.description: Sends a swarm of bats in a line, dealing damage to enemies they pass through.

silence.name: Silence
silence.description: Silences all enemies in an area, preventing them from casting spells.

spiritSiphon.name: Spirit Siphon
spiritSiphon.description: Creates a link between Death Prophet and an enemy, draining their HP and slowing them.

exorcism.name: Exorcism
exorcism.description: Releases vengeful spirits that swarm enemies, dealing physical damage and healing Death Prophet.
